It is so so so bad experience we have had. We book this hotel because it is located near from Hoan Kiem lake. We think that may be it is not modern but clean. But it is not like that anymore. The room is too dirty, wet, terrible smell. We booked this hotel several days before we travel to Hanoi. The time for checking in is 12, but when we come to the hotel at 7pm, they gave us a dirty room. The room have not cleaned from the previous client. When we told them about that, they asked us to wait for at least 30' for cleaning room. They told us that the maids forgot cleaning it and didn't have any word for sorry us. And absolutely, we never never never come back. Terrible. Awful.
The staff is friendly and the location is at the center of Hanoi. However, the room's quality is so bad. It is extremely old and it ruins. The smell is not good as well.
It 's a good place to stay in old district in Ha Noi. The receptionist is kind and gives us a lot useful information for our trip.
Great hotel and great service, we will come back

Minh thue 2 phong. Phong 1 thi co gian va ruoi chet nam rai rac trong phong. Phong 2 thi toilet qua boc mui, toi ngu phai dong cua toilet va chan khan duoi khe cua de mui hoi khong tran ra khuon vien phong ngu! Ca 2 phong thi dep di trong phong deu bi am co cam giac nhu dep cu su dung lai! Nhac ngoai hanh lang qua on nen khong ngu duoc. Nhan vien phuc vu va quan ly khÃ¡chsáº¡n trong buffet sang thieu chuyen nghiep! Khi quay ly thuy tinh da het, cac ban thay khach can cung khong refill. Dung doi mai nen minh co xin cac ban cho xin 1 ly thuy tinh sach. Thi co 1 ban voi vao phia sau quay ly (noi tap hop cac ly, chen bac ban duoc don tu ban khach vao de do va cho duoc dem vao trong de rua), lua trong nhung chiec ly ban coi ly nao trong sach nhat thi dua cho minh. Ban do con cam may cai ly ban len coi coi roi bo xuong, xong chon cai ly chinh giua cai mam chen bac ban dua cho minh. Minh chung kien canh do tu dau den cuoi, minh van cam cai ly va hoi ban do: ua ly nay sach khong em? Chi thay em lay trong may ly ban ra ma? Thi ban tra loi la ly sach va quay lung bo di. Minh cam ly len va nhin thi thay co vet son moi cua khach truoc do su dung! Minh cam thay buon cuoi va dua chiec ly do cho ban nhan vien nu khac va noi ve van de nay. Ban nhan vien do cam thang vao trong va doi 1 hoi lau sau moi nhan duoc 1 chiec ly sach. Ngay thu 2 thi nhan vien phuc vu nu don ban cu luon xung ho chi voi minh va khong biet ban do bao nhieu tuoi so voi minh, va cam thay do la su thieu ton trong va chuyen nghiep! Minh nghi trong khach san 5 sao, dieu quan trong nhat la sach se va thai do nhan vien. Du cho la moi lan muon di dau minh deu chay xe 30p de ra duong chinh, nhung doi lai dich vu phai xuat sac. Trong truong hop nay tat ca lam hong ca 1 chuyen di ma minh danh cho ba me minh. Qua that vong va cam thay khong xung dang voi so tien minh da bo ra! Mong Traveloka co the gop y voi khach san!
